mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study(user_id, title, started_at, finished_at, count, content, category_no, views, created_at) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{title}, #{started_at}, #{finished_at}, #{count}, #{content}, #{category_no}, #{views}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT `no`, user_id, title, started_at, finished_at, `count`, content, views, category_no, created_at FROM study WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE study SET views = views + 1 WHERE no = #{no}

UPDATE study SET category_no = #{category_no}, title = #{title}, started_at = #{started_at}, finished_at = #{finished_at}, count = #{count}, content = #{content} WHERE no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.no, u.name, a.title, a.started_at, a.finished_at, a.count, a.content, a.category_no, a.VIEWS, a.CREATED_AT AS crr, c.type AS type, cast(a.CREATED_AT as date) AS created_at, count_member, COALESCE(f.fav_count, 0) AS fav_count, cast(now() as date) AS cur_date FROM study a LEFT JOIN (SELECT study_no , count(study_no) AS count_member FROM study_mate where approve_yn ='Y' GROUP BY study_no) AS b ON a.no = b.study_no JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT b_no, count(b_no) AS fav_count FROM favorites GROUP BY b_no) AS f ON f.b_no = a.no LEFT JOIN category c ON c.no = a.category_no ORDER BY crr DESC
select no, count, count_member from study s join (select study_no, count(study_no) as count_member from study_mate where study_no = #{no} and approve_yn = 'Y' as sm on s.no = sm.study_no;
select count(study_no) from study_mate where study_no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT a.*, b.count_member FROM study a JOIN ( SELECT study_no, count(study_no) AS count_member FROM study_mate where approve_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY study_no) AS b ON a.no = b.study_no JOIN study_mate AS c ON a.no = c.study_no WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id} AND approve_yn = 'Y' AND a.finished_at > now();

SELECT sm.user_id, s.`no`, s.title, sm.approve_yn, u.`name` as `name`, u.edu_no FROM STUDY_MATE sm JOIN STUDY s ON sm.study_no = s.`no` JOIN `user` u ON u.id = sm.user_id WHERE u.edu_no IS NOT NULL AND sm.user_id <> s.user_id AND s.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY study_no;
mapper.update: UPDATE study_mate SET approve_yn = CASE WHEN approve_yn = 'N' THEN 'Y' WHEN approve_yn = 'Y' THEN 'N' END WHERE user_id = #{user_id} and study_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select approve_yn from study_mate where user_id = #{user_id} AND study_no = #{no}
SELECT *, ( SELECT count(*) FROM FAVORITES WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND b_no = #{b_no} GROUP BY user_id) AS fav_count FROM favorites WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND b_no = #{b_no}

SELECT a.no, u.name, a.title, a.started_at, a.finished_at, a.count, a.content, a.category_no, a.VIEWS, a.CREATED_AT AS crr, c.type AS type, cast(a.CREATED_AT as date) AS created_at, count_member, COALESCE(f.fav_count, 0) AS fav_count, cast(now() as date) AS cur_date FROM study a LEFT JOIN (SELECT study_no , count(study_no) AS count_member FROM study_mate where approve_yn ='Y' GROUP BY study_no) AS b ON a.no = b.study_no JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT b_no, count(b_no) AS fav_count FROM favorites GROUP BY b_no) AS f ON f.b_no = a.no LEFT JOIN category c ON c.no = a.category_no ORDER BY fav_count DESC

SELECT a.no AS no, u.name, a.title, a.started_at, a.finished_at, a.count, a.content, a.category_no, a.VIEWS, a.CREATED_AT AS crr, c.type AS type, cast(a.CREATED_AT as date) AS created_at, count_member, COALESCE(f.fav_count, 0) AS fav_count, cast(now() as date) AS cur_date FROM study a LEFT JOIN (SELECT study_no , count(study_no) AS count_member FROM study_mate where approve_yn ='Y' GROUP BY study_no) AS b ON a.no = b.study_no JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT b_no, count(b_no) AS fav_count FROM favorites GROUP BY b_no) AS f ON f.b_no = a.no LEFT JOIN category c ON c.no = a.category_no WHERE a.category_no = #{category_no} ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT s.no, s.title, cast(s.CREATED_AT as date) AS created_at, s.user_id, fav_count, f.* FROM study s JOIN (select b_no,count(*) as fav_count from favorites where user_id='user1@gmail.com' group by b_no) c ON s.no = c.b_no JOIN favorites f ON s.no = f.b_no JOIN user u ON u.id = f.user_id WHERE f.no is not null AND f.user_id = #{user_id}
